descriptionHtml:
AS SEEN ON THE STEAM WORKSHOP

The Legend was true, and the Arch-Mage was hiding it all along! 

* Gloves are found in the Arch-Mage's quarters 
* You can learn it's effects and make other items with fortify enchanting 
* Craftable at the Atronach Forge, the recipe has the same chance of being found as all other recipes 
* Should conflict only with mods that change the Arch-Mage quarters and maybe Atronach Forge's recipes 
* Due to some requests, now the gloves are stashed on a secret stash somewhere in the archmage's quarters 

P.S: I won't put them in some obvious and simple place, if you don't want to search for them, open the console and type: 

help "Master Enchanter Gloves" 

you'll find out the itemID and can simply add it to your inventory with the command: 

player.additem itemID 1 

To all those who found the gloves before the last update, your gift is an extra set of gloves :D 

As always, suggestions and comments are welcome!
author: Pwfd
